short_description: Its signal is used by the engine control module to calculate the amount of air entering the engine so that the correct amount of fuel is injected

product_description: An ACDelco Professional, premium aftermarket Manifold Absolute Pressure (MAP) Sensor is a high quality replacement for many vehicles on the road today. It measures the intake manifold pressure. The MAP sensor is a part of the fuel and engine management system. Its signal is used by the engine control module along with the throttle position sensor to calculate the amount of air entering the engine so that the correct amount of fuel is injected for optimum combustion. This premium aftermarket replacement manifold absolute pressure sensor is manufactured to meet your expectations for fit, form, and function.

【ELIMINATE HEAT INTERFERENCE】Rescue Your Sensor from Turbo Heat: By relocating the MAP sensor away from exhaust manifolds, our spacer prevents thermal distortion that causes unstable power and false error codes. Restores true engine performance.

【PROTECT YOUR SENSOR】Shield your MAP sensor from dirty exhaust gases and sticky oil buildup with our heat-resistant spacer block. By relocating the sensor away from contaminated airflow, it ensures accurate pressure readings for reliable engine performance.
【PLUG-AND-PLAY UPGRADE】3-minute installation: Remove factory sensor → Secure spacer → Mount new unit. Zero wiring or ECU tuning – uses OEM connectors for error-free setup.
